subject: Hurricane Sandy (2012)
Basketball
lead_paragraph: When the Nets finally take the court Saturday night — against the Toronto Raptors at Barclays Center — they will become the last N.B.A. team to open the season.
snippet: When the Nets finally take the court Saturday night — against the Toronto Raptors at Barclays Center — they will become the last N.B.A. team to open the season.
